analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkham viharati sa vighātam sa upāyāsam sa pariḷāha

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā

original: Indriyesu aguttadvāratāya ca, bhojane amattaññutāya ca.
analyzed: indriyesu a gutta dvāra tāya ca bhojane a mattaññu tāya ca

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkham viharati sa vighātam sa upāyāsam sa pariḷāha

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhāti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
